dataModel.name: totalParticipantsNotEmployed
dataModel.description: The total number of people involved in an activity who are not delivery partners or employed in the project. These would typically be the volunteer participants and/or event attendees.

dataModel.name: numberOfIndigenousParticipants
dataModel.description: The number of indigenous people participating in an activity who are not delivery partners or employed in the project (ie. Indigenous volunteers)

dataModel.name: numberOnCountryVisits
dataModel.description: The number of unique indigenous on-country visits undertaken as part of this activity

dataModel.name: totalParticipantsNew
dataModel.description: The number of people involved in an activity who have not attended other activities associated with the project

dataModel.name: numberOfCommunityGroups
dataModel.description: The number of different community groups (non delivery partners) participating in this activity

dataModel.name: numberOfFarmingEntitiesNew
dataModel.description: A farming entity is a farm business (whether sole trader, partnership, company, etc.) that would be considered a primary producer for tax purposes.
